value.stringValue: The Custom_Bridge_Request_Other_Pricing_w_Reno-2 invocable process failed to start because no records in your org match the record Id specified. In the entities that invoke Custom_Bridge_Request_Other_Pricing_w_Reno-2, such as other processes, check the value for this input: SObjectId.

The Custom_Bridge_Request_Other_Pricing_w_Reno-2 invocable process failed to start because a valid value wasn't found. This can happen when entities that invoke Custom_Bridge_Request_Other_Pricing_w_Reno-2, such as other processes, don't have values for either the SObject or SObjectId. For example: -An SObject or SObject ID wasn't specified. -A value might have been included, but it was null at runtime.

Flow.description: Trigger to indicate if a Commercial Loan with Reno Deal is a 'Custom' or 'Standard' request

value.stringValue: AND( ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].LOC_Loan_Type__c, "Other"), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Product_Sub_Type__c, "Renovation"), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Estimated_Sponsor_Tier__c, "Tier 1"), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Recourse__c, "Yes"), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Draw_Period__c, "9 Months"), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Repayment_Period__c, "12 Months"), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Line_Expiration__c, "12 Months"), [Opportunity].Requested_LTC_Max__c <= 50/100, [Opportunity].Requested_LTV_Max__c <= 80/100, ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Requested_Interest_Type__c, "Fixed"), ISPICKVAL([Opportunity].Requested_Revolving__c, "No"), [Opportunity].Requested_ARV_LTV__c <= 70/100, [Opportunity].Requested_Max_Reno_Cost_Reimbursement__c <= 90/100, [Opportunity].Requested_Reno_Limit__c <= 100, [Opportunity].Requested_Total_Loan_LTC__c <= 90/100)
